name: The Risen Dead VR
description: Eliminate the zombies in the virtual reality of The Risen Dead VR and find out your viability. Experience thrilling thrill through attacking real-life zombies and other players.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 - 4590 3.3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7 - 4770 3.4 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 Storage: 10 GB available space
